alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 8:12PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Pasco, northeastern Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 811 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near University to Tampa to near Macdill Air Force Base. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Temple Terrace, Lutz, St. Petersburg, South Highpoint, Tampa International Airport, Egypt Lake-Leto, Greater Carrollwood, University, West And East Lealman, Keystone, Greater Northdale, East Lake, Macdill Air Force Base, Gandy, Citrus Park and Lake Magdalene. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
